verbose_text: By far the most common mutation is a single substitution of glutamic acid to valine at residue 600 (B-Raf V600E) which greatly elevates the kinase activity of B-Raf and results in the constitutive activation of ERK in vivo, independent of Ras [XREF_BIBR].
evidence: B-Raf V600E ) which greatly elevates the kinase activity of B-Raf and results in the constitutive activation of ERK
